description: This file defines a Flutter widget, VocabCard, which is a UI component for displaying a vocabulary item with interactive favorites and learned status toggles. It utilizes external models and theme styling, and is specific to vocabulary card representation within the application.

classes.name: VocabCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays vocabulary information with favorite and learned toggles.

methods.name: VocabCard
methods.description: Constructor for creating a VocabCard widget, with required vocabulary item and toggle callbacks.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the vocabulary card, including labels, colors, and interactive icons.
